terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks
Class VisualizeBlocks

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.utils.blocks.VisualizeBlocks
public class VisualizeBlocks
extends java.lang.Object

These utilities are common building block utilities that were first introduced for the book's examples on "visualization".

Because these building blocks are rather specific in purpose they are included here as utilities instead of as general purpose building block classes in the framework core.

Method Detail

buildViewFover

public static final Actuator buildViewFover(AppView view,
                                            javax.vecmath.Vector2d clamp,
                                            int mouseButtons,
                                            int mouseModifiers,
                                            int arrowModifiers)
Builds a FOV actuator, attaches the specified view to it, and connects it to a relative dragger. Increasing dragger Y decreases FOV (zoom in). Note that in AppView a FOV of zero results in a parallel projection.

Parameters:
view - View to be attached and the drag input source.
clamp - Limits on the view FOV range.
mouseButtons - Mouse buttons enabling drag (Input.BUTTON_???).
mouseModifiers - Modifier keys enabling mouse drag (Input.MODIFIER_???).
arrowModifiers - Modifier keys enabling arrow drag
Returns:
New orbit group.
